name: Untitled Necromancy Game
description:
Submission for the Greenlight Jam

*insert name* is a level-based puzzle platformer where you play as a young student clearing dungeon levels in order to graduate from necromancy school. Rather than avoiding death, you must die strategically in order to reanimate yourself, solve puzzles, and escape the trap filled dungeon.

DISCLAIMER: This game is not in a playable stage, only the documentation is public
